title: Ukraine President, Tracy Edmonds, Comedy Roulette, Motown 60 and more.
itunes:title: Ukraine President, Tracy Edmonds, Comedy Roulette, Motown 60 and more.
description:
Today the show opens with an accompaniment of players.  A comedian wins presidential election by a landslide with 72% of the vote.  Tracey Edmonds has a premiere tonight on BET and is getting married.  Pioneering filmmaker John Singleton suffers a stroke.  We have the directions that black folks give in Comedy Roulette.  Motown 60 was on Sunday and Stevie Wonder, Smokey Robinson, Ciara, J-Lo and more hit the stage.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about the stars shining when it's dark and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
